A short Python scriptÂ¶

This demonstrates an example .py file that is not executed when gallery is generated (see build_pattern) but nevertheless gets included as an example. Note that no output is capture as this file is not executed.

# Code source: Ã“scar NÃ¡jera

from __future__ import print_function
print([i for i in range(10)])
